column4: hello.. i have some problems running a java applet because i dont have the newest JRE version.. i downloaded it, installed it on usr/lib, cleared java and web browser cache but nothing happens.. what should i do?
can you tell me specificly what i should look for on that java page?
if you need java to run it then look at that page. Should contain all the info you need. I don't use java myself so i can't really help there.
